content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item.(For each problem, you need to first present three related but not identical problems, along with a description of each problem and its solution. Finally, provide the answer to the original problem in the form of "Therefore, the final answer is: ".)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a moving van. Moving in a clockwise direction from the moving van, the elements on the path are a Cocker Spaniels, a football helmet, a Dungeness crab, a milk can, a house finch, a ram, a Brittany, an aircraft carrier, an eraser, a Standard Poodle, a black-and-white colobus, a high-speed train, a ground beetle, a maraca, a yurt, a throne, a suspension bridge, a proboscis monkey, and a turnstile. Starting from the football helmet, you move around the ring by 15 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 20 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

From the football helmet, if you move 15 steps counter-clockwise, you will reach the yurt.
If you continue moving 8 more steps counter-clockwise from the yurt, you will reach the proboscis monkey.
Finally, if you move 20 more steps counter-clockwise from the proboscis monkey, you will end up at the milk can.

Therefore, the final answer is: milk can.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a moving van. Moving in a clockwise direction from the moving van, the elements on the path are a Cocker Spaniels, a football helmet, a Dungeness crab, a milk can, a house finch, a ram, a Brittany, an aircraft carrier, an eraser, a Standard Poodle, a black-and-white colobus, a high-speed train, a ground beetle, a maraca, a yurt, a throne, a suspension bridge, a proboscis monkey, and a turnstile. Starting from the football helmet, you move around the ring by 30 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 16 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 40 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

From the football helmet, if you move 30 steps counter-clockwise, you will reach the maraca.
If you continue moving 16 more steps counter-clockwise from the maraca, you will reach the black-and-white colobus.
Finally, if you move 40 more steps counter-clockwise from the black-and-white colobus, you will end up at the Cocker Spaniels.

Therefore, the final answer is: Cocker Spaniels.
